text: I think there is no one on this subreddit that could say no to this and actually mean it. You perfectly summarised one of my many issues.
Things that would be left unfinished, that it would look like I gave up. There are some people who would use it to feel better about themselves, which is unacceptable.

Because people love to talk even if the don't know anything about what they are saying. Anyone who says that people under 18 can't be depressed is simply wrong. I was actually tought about this topic.
